column2: "Destroying larger targets rather than small ones hurts the enemy much more--that much is obvious."
"But in the end, all of the Darkers will be exterminated, so it doesn't really matter how they're divided."
"But since you seem to be more ambitious than the other ARKS members I've met, I thought this one would be perfect for you."
"Take it or leave it. No one is forcing you to do anything."
